mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_logs(appname, funs, name, msg, userid, useraccount, username, ip, type, createtime, zzjgdm, zzjgmc) values(#{appName}, #{funs}, #{name}, #{msg}, #{userId}, #{userAccount}, #{userName}, #{ip}, #{type}, to_date(#{createtime},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{zzjgdm}, #{zzjgmc})
